com.redhat.rhn.manager.kickstart

Class KickstartUrlHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.manager.kickstart.KickstartUrlHelper

  • public class KickstartUrlHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple helper class to ecapsulate logic around determining kickstart file and media urls.

    • Method Detail

      • getKickstartFileUrl

        public java.lang.String getKickstartFileUrl()
        The definitive method for getting the URL to a given Kickstart profile on the Spacewalk server. If your Kickstart profile is named 'rhel5-Server-i386' the url would be: http://spacewalk.example.com/kickstart/ks/org/1/label/rhel5-Server-i386
        Returns:
        String url to kickstart file

      • getKickstartFileUrlBase

        public java.lang.String getKickstartFileUrlBase()
        The base for a kickstart URL including the org: http://spacewalk.example.com/kickstart/ks/org/1/
        Returns:
        String url to kickstart file

      • getKickstartFileUrlBase

        public static java.lang.String getKickstartFileUrlBase(Org org,
                                       java.lang.String host,
                                       java.lang.String protocol)
        The base for a kickstart URL including the org: http://spacewalk.example.com/kickstart/ks/cfg/org/1/
        Parameters:
        org - the org of the kickstart data
        host - the host name
        protocol - the protocol used.
        Returns:
        base url to kickstart file

      • getKickstartOrgDefaultUrl

        public java.lang.String getKickstartOrgDefaultUrl()
        Get the URL to the org_default for this Org. Looks like this: https://rhn.redhat.com/kickstart/ks/org/ 2824120xe553d920d21606ccfc668e13bd8d8e3f/org_default
        Returns:
        String url

      • getKickstartFileUrlIpRange

        public java.lang.String getKickstartFileUrlIpRange()
        Get the URL for the ip_range file server. Example: http://spacewalk.example.com/kickstart/ks/org/1/mode/ip_range The above URL examines the requesters IP address to determine what ks profile they should get.
        Returns:
        String URL

      • getKickstartFileUrlIpRange

        public static java.lang.String getKickstartFileUrlIpRange(Org org,
                                          java.lang.String host,
                                          java.lang.String protocol)
        Get the URL for the ip_range file server. Example: http://spacewalk.example.com/kickstart/ks/org/1/mode/ip_range
        Parameters:
        org - the org of the kickstart data
        host - the host name
        protocol - the protocol used.
        Returns:
        base url to kickstart iprange file.

      • getKickstartMediaUrl

        public java.lang.String getKickstartMediaUrl()
        Get the --url parameter for this kickstart. This is the full url including media path: http://somehost.example.com/ks/dist/ks-rhel-i386-as-4-u2
        Returns:
        String url to this KickstartData's --url

      • getKickstartChildRepoUrl

        public java.lang.String getKickstartChildRepoUrl(Channel child)
        get a kickstart repo url for a child channel
        Parameters:
        child - the child channel
        Returns:
        string that represents the repo url

      • getKickstartMediaPath

        public java.lang.String getKickstartMediaPath()
        Get the media path for the KickstartableTree. Example: /ks/dist/ks-rhel-i386-as-4-u2
        Returns:
        media path to the KickstartableTree .. /ks/dist/ks-rhel-i386-as-4-u2

      • getCobblerMediaUrl

        public java.lang.String getCobblerMediaUrl()
        Get the cobbler style --url: http://$http_server/$media_url To be filled out by cobbler. not spacewalk.
        Returns:
        String url , cobbler style: http://$http_server/$media_url

      • getRepoUrl

        public java.lang.String getRepoUrl(RepoInfo repo)
        Return the repo URL to be used in the formatted
        Parameters:
        repo - the repo object
        Returns:
        the repo url.

      • getKickstartMediaPath

        public java.lang.String getKickstartMediaPath(KickstartSession session,
                                     java.util.Date date)
        Get the url path portion for this kickstart that is used during a Kickstart Session that tracks the downloads. Computes: /ks/dist/session/35x45fed383beaeb31a184166b4c1040633/ks-f9-x86_64 reformated to a tinyurl: /ty/xZ38
        Parameters:
        session - to compute tracking URL for.
        date - for tiny url track
        Returns:
        String url to this KickstartData's media (packages, kernel etc...)

      • getKickstartMediaSessionUrl

        public java.lang.String getKickstartMediaSessionUrl(KickstartSession session)
        Get the --url parameter for this kickstart that is used during a Kickstart Session that tracks the downloads. eg: http://spacewalk.example.com/ks/dist/session/ 35x45fed383beaeb31a184166b4c1040633/ks-f9-x86_64
        Parameters:
        session - to compute tracking URL for.
        Returns:
        String url to this KickstartData's media (packages, kernel etc...)

      • getCobblerProfilePath

        public static java.lang.String getCobblerProfilePath(java.lang.String profileName)
        Returns the actual kickstart url
        Parameters:
        profileName - the name of the profile
        Returns:
        the KS url.

      • getCobblerProfileUrl

        public static java.lang.String getCobblerProfileUrl(KickstartData data)
        Get the cobbler profile url
        Parameters:
        data - the kickstart data
        Returns:
        the url
